mapper.select: SELECT endDate, audienceId, layer, averageOrderCount90Days, averageOrderAmount90Days, averageAddCartCount90Days, averageOrderCount2Years, averageOrderDays90Days, averageViewCount90Days, top5AverageOrderCount90Days, top5AverageOrderAmount90Days, top5AverageAddCartCount90Days, top5AverageOrderCount2Years, top5AverageOrderDays90Days, top5AverageViewCount90Days FROM ads_polaris_clv_disassemble_feature_trend_pre/statistics WHERE monitorId = #{monitorId} and startDate = #{startDate} and endDate = #{endDate} LIMIT 10000
